name: 梁曉帆
objective: 此課程旨在以人為本，研究互動系統之設計與評估。使學生了解人類認知過程之理論與模式以及其工作與環境之特性，並使學生能應用設計程序與評估方法來提升系統之績效。
schedule:
Week 1: Interaction paradigms
Week 2: No class
Week 3: Interaction frameworks and styles
Week 4: Interaction design process
Week 5: Discovery
Week 6: Design
Week 7: Design principles
Week 8: Interaction design models
Week 9: Usability testing
Week 10: Mid-term Exam
Week 11-15: Facets of interaction
Week 16-17: Seminars
Week 18: Project presentation
scorePolicy:
Mid-term Exam: 40%
Method Review Report 20%
Project Report & Presentation: 30%
Reports of Seminars: 10%
materials: The Resonant Interface: HCI Foundations for Interaction Design (2008) by Steven Heim, Pearson (全華)
